all right now you want to bring this to
a simmer and you just want to simmer it

take about an hour and fifteen minutes
and it goes through several stages first
it just looks like this after about 40

kind of soak up a little bit of that hot

a split peas and then it's kind of
almost like a clear liquid another 45
minutes later it has turned into which
you would recognize as split pea soup
now you want to taste this because the

that's why I didn't put a lot of salt
